Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer violated procedural fairness by failing to inform Ms. Cornea of suspicions regarding fraudulent documents
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of a visa application refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubts about Ms. Cornea's employment history
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Suspected submission of fraudulent documents and lack of procedural fairness
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of notification regarding suspicion of fraud
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to inform applicant of suspicion of fraud
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Order for reconsideration by another visa officer
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Duty to inform applicant of adverse credibility concerns
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Judicial review allowed; application to be reassessed
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Doubts about employment history and suspected fraudulent documents
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Documents not explicitly challenged before decision
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Violation found due to lack of notice
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Ms. Cornea argued lack of opportunity to respond
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide notice of fraud suspicion
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to notify applicant of specific allegations
